meanings.definition: Macs: a type of computer made by Apple Inc.
meanings.sent1: I use Macs for my school work.
meanings.sent2: Many graphic designers prefer Macs over PCs.
meanings.sent3: The Macs at the store were all sleek and shiny.
meanings.sent4: In the world of technology, Macs are like the Ferraris of computers.
meanings.sent5: The Macs in the classroom hummed softly as students worked on them.

meanings.definition: Macs: a type of raincoat or waterproof outer garment.
meanings.sent1: She wore a bright yellow Macs during the rainy day.
meanings.sent2: The hikers packed their Macs in case of sudden showers.
meanings.sent3: The Macs kept them dry as they danced in the rain.
meanings.sent4: Her Macs shielded her from the storm like a protective cloak.
meanings.sent5: The Macs flapped in the wind as they walked along the beach.

meanings.definition: Macs: a shortened form of the name 'Macintosh'.
meanings.sent1: He typed on his Macs to finish the project.
meanings.sent2: The company logo featured the word 'Macs' in bold letters.
meanings.sent3: The Macs logo was so tiny, it made him chuckle.
meanings.sent4: Her love for Macs was as deep as the ocean.
meanings.sent5: The Macs sticker on her laptop was peeling at the edges.
